resources.title: Configuration
resources.description: Select waste types and configure options

data_description.resources: Select the waste types you want to track
data_description.name: Custom name for this integration instance (optional)
data_description.nameprefix: Add waste collector name as prefix to sensor names
data_description.dateformat: Date format for sensor values (Python strftime format)
data_description.upcomingsensor: Create additional sensors for today, tomorrow, and next upcoming collection
data_description.dateonly: Show only date without day names (overrides other day settings)
data_description.dateobject: Use timestamp objects instead of formatted text (for automations)
data_description.dutch: Show day and month names in Dutch instead of English
data_description.dayofweek: Include day of week in sensor values (e.g., 'Monday, 01-01-2024')
data_description.dayofweekonly: Show only day names for nearby dates (today, tomorrow, day names)
data_description.alwaysshowday: Always show day names, even for dates more than a week away
data_description.builtinicons: Use built-in icons for waste types (classic icon set)
data_description.builtiniconsnew: Use built-in icons for waste types (modern icon set)
data_description.disableicons: Disable all icons for waste type sensors
data_description.updateinterval: How often to check for updated waste collection data (0 = use default interval)
data_description.addressid: Address ID for Ximmio-based collectors (if required by your waste collector)
data_description.customerid: Customer ID for Ximmio-based collectors (if required by your waste collector)
data_description.custommapping: Custom waste type mappings in JSON format (for renaming waste types)

error.invalid_custom_mapping: Invalid JSON format in custom mapping
